card.name: Adamantine Frame
card.property:
Put only on characters that have 10 [STARS] or more.
The upgraded character becomes [Sturdy].

card.name: Champion's Chassis
card.property:
Play this only if you had Optimus Prime on your starting team
Up to 2 Champion's Chassis can fit in 1 of Optimus Prime's Armor slots.
Tough 1
When this is scrapped > Repair 1 damage from each character on your team.

card.name: Downfall Protocol
card.property:
[Reveal] > When your opponent plays an Action or Upgrade from their hand.
[When Revealed] > Return that card to its owner's hand and, if it is an Action, it has no effect. If a character on your team is in Legend mode, each of your characters gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: End Of The Road
card.property:
Enemies can't use [Brave] this turn and damage can't be repaired this turn.
For each enemy in Legend mode > Do damage to that character equal to the number of Upgrades on it.

card.name: Guardian Shell
card.property:
When you put this on a character > Draw a card.
When this is scrapped from a character > Repair 1 damage from that character.

card.name: Hunt Down
card.property:
This card is unaffected by enemy Secret Actions.
One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.
For each enemy Secret Action that's face-up or face-down > One of your characters gets [Pierce 2] until end of turn.

card.name: Into The Fray
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your tapped characters defends.
[When Revealed] > If your opponent flips at least [O][O][O] this battle, the defender gets +3 [DEF] until end of turn. Otherwise, the defender gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: Knack
card.property: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may play a card from your scrap pile that has at least one battle icon in common with a battle icon revealed this way.

card.name: Must Die Sometime
card.property:
Enemies can't use [Stealth] this turn and lose [Sturdy] until end of turn.
For each character on your team > You may move up to 1 damage from it to an enemy in Legend mode from a different faction.

card.name: Alpha Trion, Archivist of Iacon
card.property:
Your starting [STAR] limit increases by 1 if this began the game with an [Autobot] character on him in Head mode.
When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a card from your hand to reveal the top card of your deck. If you did, you may play a card from your scrap pile that has at least one battle icon color in common with a battle icon revealed this way. Then, scrap the revealed card.

alternate.name: Alpha Trion, Archivist of Iacon
alternate.property:
Each [Autobot] on your team has [Focus 1].
Each [Sturdy] character on your team has +2 [ATK].

card.name: Bitter Half
card.property:
Each [Dreadwing] character on your team has [Tough 1].
When you scrap 2 or more cards from your hand > Draw a card.
When you combine into Dreadwing, Sky Destroyer > Move 1 damage from him to each enemy. Then, flip this.

alternate.name: Bitter Half
alternate.property:
This Stratagem now applies to your Dreadwing, Sky Destroyer.
Each [Dreadwing] character on your team has [Tough 1].
When you scrap 2 or more cards from your hand > Draw a card.

card.name: Never Give Up
card.property:
While this card is in your hand > When your opponent's card causes you to scrap this card, draw 2 cards.
One of your characters gets [Bold 2] until end of turn. It can attack untapped characters this turn as though they were tapped.

card.name: Particle Beam Cannon
card.property:
Play this only if you had Megatron on your starting team.
This can be in Megatron's Armor or Utility slot.
[Bold 1]
When this is scrapped > Draw a card.

card.name: Reverse Engineer
card.property:
You may put a card from your opponent's scrap pile into their KO area.
If your opponent has an Upgrade in their KO area > You may play an Upgrade of the same type as any Upgrade in their KO area.

card.name: Seek And Destroy
card.property:
While this is in your hand > When a [Decepticon] card would cause this card to be scrapped from your hand, instead put it into your KO area and do 1 damage to an enemy.
Each [Decepticon] on your team gets +1 [ATK], [Bold 1], and [Pierce 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Undermine
card.property: Look at your opponent's hand and scrap an [Autobot] card, [Decepticon] card, or [Mercenary] card from it.

card.name: Will Of The Protocols
card.property:
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Your opponent separates those cards into 2 piles. Put 1 pile into your hand and scrap the other pile.
If Alpha Trion was on your starting team > Each [Autobot] on your team gets [Focus 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Gear Up
card.property: When you flip your Sergeant Hound, Infantry • Recon to Bot mode > You may play an Armor or Utility from your hand on him.

card.name: Ariel, Frontline Rebel
card.property:
[Brave]
If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, and you began the game with an [Autobot] Stratagem > [Arise].

alternate.name: Elita-1, Frontline Rebel
alternate.property:
[Tough 1]
Enemies can't use [Stealth].
When this attacks > Repair 1 damage from one of your [Autobots]. If that character is Optimus Prime, repair 2 instead.

card.name: More Than Meets The Eye
card.property:
While your Optimus Prime, Freedom Fighter is defending > He has tough 1 and the attacker's [Pierce] total is reduced by 1.
While an Optimus Prime character on your team has a Utility on him > Each other character on your team gets +1 [ATK] and [Pierce 1].

card.name: Autobot Highbrow, Agent of Justice
card.property:
Your starting [STAR] limit increases by 1 if this began the game with an [Autobot] character on him in Head mode.
[Pierce 1], [Tough 1]
When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top card of your deck. Your opponent may choose one of their characters and do 2 damage to it to scrap that card. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

alternate.name: Autobot Highbrow, Agent of Justice
alternate.property:
[Focus 1]
Sturdy
If your card would cause you to reveal cards from the top of your deck > Reveal that many plus one instead.

card.name: Rough And Tumble
card.property:
If you begin the game with no [Autobots] on your starting team > Your Flamewar, Veteran Decepticon begins the game in Bot mode.
When one of your [Decepticons] attacks, if you have Flamewar, Veteran Decepticon on your team, and you flip at least [B][B] > The attacker gets +1 [ATK] until end of battle.

card.name: Autobot Xort
card.property: [Head] +1 [HEALTH], +[Pierce 1]

alternate.name: Autobot Xort
alternate.property: [Pierce 1]

card.name: Battlefield Shockwave, Targeted Artillery
card.property: When a character on your team battle an enemy that has either [Brave] or [Stealth] > The battling character on your team gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

alternate.name: Full-Caliber Laser Vulcan
alternate.property:
Enemies can't use [Brave] or [Stealth] against the upgraded character.
When the upgraded character attacks > You may draw a card. If you don't, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

card.name: Target Acquired

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Raider Tailwind, Air Strike Patrol • Strategist

card.property:
Each of your [Air Strike Patrols] has [Tough 1].
When an enemy combines or an enemy Arises > Return a [G] card from your scrap pile to hand.
When a character on your team battle an enemy in Legend mode, and you have an [Air Strike Patrol] on your team > Your battling charater gets [Bold 1] and [Tough 1] until end of battle.

card.name: Bulkhead, Munitions Lobber
card.property:
Your deck can have up to 1 extra [STAR] of differently named cards for each other [Wrecker] on your starting team.
Tough 1
When you flip to this mode > Do 1 damage to an enemy.

alternate.name: Bulkhead, Munitions Lobber
alternate.property: MWhile a [Wrecker] on your team is defending > Reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total by a number equal to the attacker's [Bold] total.

card.name: Track Record
card.property:
Each [Mercenary] on your team has [Tough 1].
Before the game begins > You may reveal a Soldier's Blaster from your deck and put it under Lockdown, Bounty Hunter.

card.name: Decepticon Jetfire, Repentant Ringleader
card.property:
When this defends > Do 1 damage to the attacker.
If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card and you began the game with no Stratagems > You may return an upgrade from your scrap pile to your hand. Then, you may scrap an enemy Upgrade. Then, [Arise].

alternate.name: Autobot Jetfire, Repentant Ringleader
alternate.property:
At the start of your turn > You may play an Upgrade from your hand on one of your [Autobots].
When this attacks > Do 1 damage to each enemy and draw a card.

card.name: Doubledealer, Loyal To None
card.property:
Enemy [Autobots] can't use [Brave] or [Stealth] against this character.
When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top card of your deck. If an enemy is in Legend mode, you may play it. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

alternate.name: Doubledealer, Loyal To None
alternate.property:
Your opponent's cards cannot use enemies to untap.
When this attacks a [Decepticon] > Enemies can't use [Tough] this turn.

alternate.name: Doubledealer, Loyal To None
alternate.property:
If an enemy is in Legend mode > This has +2 [ATK] and +2 [DEF].
When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's [Bounty] ability.
[Bounty] > You may play a Secret Action from your scrap pile.

card.name: Galvatron, Callous Tyrant
card.property:
[Pierce 4]
At the start of your turn > You may reveal a [W] card from your hand and scrap it. If you do, draw 2 cards.

alternate.name: Galvatron, Callous Tyrant
alternate.property:
[Bold 1]
When this attacks > You may reveal up to 3 [W] cards from your hand and scrap them. Do damage to the defender equal to the number of cards revealed this way. Then, if at least 2 cards were revealed this way, draw a card.

card.name: Grimlock, Resolute Warlord
card.property:
At the start of the game > For each Stratagem you began the game with, do 1 damage to this.
Each of your [Autobots] has [Tough 1].

alternate.name: Grimlock, Resolute Warlord
alternate.property: When a [Dinobot] on your team attacks and you flip battle cards > Each [B] you flipped becomes [O] until end of battle.

card.name: Knockout, Battlefield Attendant
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Your opponent may choose an Upgrade on a character on their team and scrap it. If they don't, they choose one of their characters and do 2 damage to it.

alternate.name: Knockout, Battlefield Attendant
alternate.property: When this attacks and has an Upgrade > You may reveal an Upgrade from your hand that has at least one battle icon color in common with an Upgrade on this character. If you do, put it on him.

card.name: Leader Wreck-Gar, Junkion Horde
card.property:
[Sturdy]
If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, and you had both an [Autobot] and a [Decepticon] on your starting team > [Arise].

alternate.name: Gruesome Legion, Junkion Horde
alternate.property:
This gets +1 [ATK] for each character or Upgrade in any player's KO area.
When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's [Bounty] ability. Then, use it again.
[Bounty] > Reveal the top card of your deck. You may put it into your KO area. If you don't, put it into your hand.

card.name: Megatron, Brutal Iconoclast
card.property:
[Tough 2]
When this defends > You may do 1 damage to him. If you do, scrap one of the battling enemy's Weapons.
If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, and you began the game with a [Decepticon] Stratagem > You may play a [Decepticon] card from your scrap pile. Then, [Arise].

alternate.name: Master Megatron, Brutal Iconoclast
alternate.property:
[Tough 2]
Both when you flip to this mode and at the start of your turn > You may move up to one Upgrade from another character on your team to this. If you did, move 1 damage from him to that character.
When an Upgrade is scrapped from this > He gets +2 [ATK] and +2 [DEF] until end of turn, up to +4 [ATK] and +4 [DEF].

card.name: Minimus Ambus, Armor-Bearer
card.property:
[Bold 1], [Tough 1]
[Sturdy]
If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, and you had another [Wrecker] on your starting team > Put an Ultra Magnus Armor you own from outside the game in his Armor slot. Then, [Arise].

alternate.name: Ultra Magnus, Armor-Beared
alternate.property:
[Focus 1]
When a [Wrecker] on your team takes non-attack damage > It gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of turn.
If an opponent's card would cause an Armor on this character to leave the battlefield > You may do 1 damage to another [Wrecker] on your team or 2 damage to this instead.

card.name: Ratchet, Grizzled Mechanic
card.property:
[Tough 1]
When a character on your team defends and you flip at least [B] > Repair 1 damage from the defender.

alternate.name: Ratchet, Grizzled Mechanic
alternate.property:
This has [Pierce 1] for each Upgrade he has.
If damage would be repaired from exactly one character on your team > Instead repair that much damage plus 1.

card.name: Rung, Selector-in-Chief
card.property:
While this is untapped > Each player can't flip more than 2 cards during battle.
While this is tapped > Each player can't play cards form any zone other than their hand.

alternate.name: FB Cerebral Circuit Scanner
alternate.property:
When the upgraded character attacks > Each player draws a card. Then, the upgraded characters gets +[ATK] equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand until end of battle, up to +4 [ATK].
If this would leave the battlefield > You may scrap a Weapon from your hand instead. Otherwise, put it into your KO area.

card.name: Sky Lynx, Magnificent Commander
card.property:
When you flip to this mode > Draw a card.
When a character on your team attacks an enemy in a different mode than it > Then the attacker gets +1 [ATK] until end of battle.

alternate.name: Sky Lynx, Magnificent Commander
alternate.property:
When you flip to this mode for the first time each turn > You may do 1 damage to this to play a card from your hand.
When this defends > You may scrap a card from your hand to move 1 damage from him to the attacker.

card.name: Skywarp, Troublesome Teleporter
card.property:
Your startins [STAR] limit increases by 1 for each [Seeker] that has at least 10 [STARS] on your starting team.
[Bold 1]

alternate.name: Skywarp, Troublesome Teleporter
alternate.property: [Revenge] > Move up to 1 damage from each of your [Seekers] on the battlefield to an enemy.

card.name: Thunderwing, Decepticon Powerhouse
card.property:
While you have no tapped characters on your team > This has [Stealth].
Revenge > Do 2 damage to each character.

alternate.name: Thunderwing, Decepticon Powerhouse
alternate.property:
When an enemy is KO'd > Repair 1 damage from this. Then, flip him to Alt mode.
When this attacks > Do 1 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to this.

card.name: Venin, Paranoid Leader
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. For each [O] revealed this way, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. For each [B] revealed this way, repair 1 damage from one of your [Insecticons]. Then, scrap the cards revealed this way.

alternate.name: Venin, Paranoid Leader
alternate.property: When one of your [Insecticons] battles > Flip one more battle card.
